text:
Kane！别再说话了！
我会想办法救你的！
一定！！！
什么？
别说这种傻话了！
别管手册上面是怎么说的了！
真正的你就在我眼前，我不会让你死的！
绝对不会！

Kane! Stop talking!
I’m gonna save you!
I promise!!!
What?
Stop talking nonsense!
Forget what the manual says!
The real you is right here in front of me, and I’m not gonna let you die!
I swear!

冷静下来
冷静下来
现在Kane的情况是撞击受伤导致肋骨断裂
已经出现了张力性气胸的症状
需要一个粗针头来放气
针头...
找到了！
应该能用...
但是应该插进哪个地方...
培训课上我为什么没认真听！
COSMOS，你还没重启好吗？
COSMOS！？

Calm down, Aliya
Calm down
Right now, Kane’s got a broken rib from the impact
and he’s developing tension pneumothorax
We need a thick needle to release the pressure
A needle…
I got it!
This should work…
But where do I insert it…
I should’ve paid more attention in that training class!
COSMOS, are you still not rebooted?
COSMOS!?

COSMOS！
现在不是陪你玩的时候

COSMOS!
It’s not the time to mess around!
快告诉我张力性气胸应该把钢针插进第几肋间！
Tell me where to insert the needle for the tension pneumothorax!

快点告诉我！
Kane要不行了！

Hurry up!
Kane’s not gonna make it!

好
我要扎下去了

Alright
I’m going for it

你为什么不知道？
去查啊！
去你数据库里查啊！
快啊！

How can you don't know about it?
Go check it out!
Check your database!
Hurry up!
对！应该就是这个！
Yes! That’s gotta be it!
Kane，你忍着点！
Kane, hold on!

呼，搞定了
Kane，我说过我不会让你死的
COSMOS
这次也谢谢你了

Phew, it’s done
Kane, I told you I wouldn’t let you die
COSMOS
Thanks for the help this time

Kane！
Kane！！！
......
对不起
我......

Kane!
Kane!!!
…
I’m sorry
I…

Kane！
Kane！！！
......
对不起
我......

Kane!
Kane!!!
…
I’m sorry
I…

COSMOS！！！
你怎么能在这种时候出问题呢！！
你知不知道Kane他！
Kane他......

COSMOS!!!
How could you fail at a time like this!?
Don’t you know that Kane…
He… he
我不需要你的安慰！
I don’t need your sympathy!
你不是COSMOS？
You’re not COSMOS?

只是一个普通人？
COSMOS，这不像是你说的话啊

Just an average person?
COSMOS, that doesn’t sound like you at all

为什么你会有这个问题？
有可能是程序出错了...
不过不管怎么说
我现在需要花几分钟先把Kane弄到休眠舱里
之后我们再讨论这个问题

Why would you respond like this?
Maybe it's a glitch in the program
But whatever
I need a few minutes to get Kane into the hibernation pod
We’ll talk about this afterward

好了，Kane已经在休眠舱里了
已经脱离危险了
我们继续吧

Alright, Kane’s in the hibernation pod now
He’s safe
Let’s continue

COSMOS是船载AI
和我从小就认识了
如果你不是这个COSMOS
那么你到底是谁？

COSMOS is the AI onboard this ship
I’ve known COSMOS since I was a kid
So, if you’re not COSMOS
who you really are?
风信子！
Hyacinth!
你是！
It’s you!
是的，但是你是怎么知道
Yes, but how did you know?
但是我现在都还没有检查是哪里出的问题
But I haven’t even checked where the problem is yet
我知道了，我现在立马就去
Got it, I’ll head over right away

动力室顺利搞定了
接下来就是制氧机

The engine room is fixed
Now onto the oxygen generator
制氧机也没问题了
The oxygen generator is all good too
麻烦你了
I'm counting on you
氧气升上来了！
The oxygen level is rising!

什么？
我不是很懂

What do you mean?
I don’t quite understand

父亲在那里吗！？
居然真的是！

My father is there!?
I knew it!
我有一些想问你的事情...
I got some questions to ask you…

居然是这样...
这样悲伤的结局啊...
我...最终还是没找到答案吗...

So that’s how it is…
Such a sad ending…
I… still couldn’t find the answer in the end?

既然你已经知道风信子这个暗号了
你应该知道我作为人偶...时间没剩多少了
这是我的最后的愿望
并且目前飞船导航里只有公司和科朗
也许能从父亲的飞船上找到新的方向

Since you know the hyacinth code
you must also know that as a Doll, my time is running out
This is my last wish
and currently, the ship's navigation only shows the company and Koranth
Perhaps we could find a new direction from my father’s ship

安啦
我现在不是还在这里吗？

It's okay!
I'm right here with you, right?
当然
Of course

所以...
上一次是飞船坠毁无法起飞了吗？

So…
Was it because the ship crashed and couldn’t take off last time?

那这次我会全面检查飞船状况
确保一定不会出问题
我先去给海獭号做体检了

This time, I’ll thoroughly check the ship's condition
to ensure there won’t be any issues
I’ll go conduct a full health check on Otter now

我也会加油的！
所以接下来先要做什么？

I’ll do my best too!
So, what should we do next?

密钥！
曲率引擎密钥！
你怎么拿到的！

The key!
warp drive key!
How did you get it!?

好！
我这就去
等我到了再给你发消息

Got it!
I’m on my way
I’ll message you when I get there

我已经到这里了
密钥是多少？

I've got there
What’s the key code?

是的，这其实是一场梦
你该醒了，用户
Aliya的死不是你的错

Yes, this is just a dream
Time to wake up, User
Aliya’s death wasn’t your fault

好吧，这个玩笑显得有点不合时宜了
抱歉哦
不过我现在确实就在这里
不用再担心我了
现在让我们积极点面对接下来的事情吧！
所以接下来要怎么做？

Okay, that joke was a bit out of place
Sorry~
But I really am here right now
so don’t worry about me anymore
Let’s face what’s coming with a sunny outlook!
So, what’s next?

启动了！
真的顺利启动了！
我现在还有点没反应过来
这一切都进展得好顺利

It’s working!
The warp drive is activated!
I can’t believe it’s going so smoothly
Everything’s going so smoothly

这次没有公司看着
曲率引擎等级可以想用多高用多高了
剩下的问题只有选择目的地了
但目前飞船导航里只有公司和科朗
再就是一个神秘的信号源了

Without the company monitoring us
the warp drive can run as high as we want
The only problem left is choosing the destination
Currently, the ship’s navigation only shows the company, Koranth
and a mysterious signal source

是的
能确认它的方位
和回到公司放在一起，也算是一个选择

Yes
I can confirm its location
Going back to the company is also an option
你说得对...
You’re right…
我不能继续拿同伴的性命冒险了
I can’t risk my companions’ lives any further

我确定目的地了
曲率引擎还在准备中
马上就要离开这里了
我不知道信号会不会中断

I’ve set the destination
The warp drive is still warming up
We’re about to leave this place
I don’t know if the signal will be cut off

那太令人兴奋了！
到时候找不到东西再回公司也不迟
希望这个曲率引擎还能经得起两次折腾
应该问题不大

That’s so exciting!
If we don’t find anything, we can always return to the company
Hopefully, this warp drive can handle two jumps
It should be fine

我确定目的地了
曲率引擎还在准备中
马上就要离开这里了
我不知道信号会不会中断

I’ve set the destination
The warp drive is still warming up
We’re about to leave this place
I don’t know if the signal will be cut off
已经到目的地了
We’ve reached the destination
距离并不是很远
It wasn’t that far away

一定会再见面的
这次只会是短暂的分开
再见，用户

We’ll definitely meet again
This will only be a short separation
Goodbye, User

目前飞船导航里只有公司和科朗
说不定能在父亲那里找到新的方位

The ship’s navigation only shows the company and Koranth
Perhaps we could find a new direction from my father’s ship
别闹
Stop messing around

所以...
你是...
我知道你一定是对我很重要的人
但，我肯定是没办法记起了
能再一次告诉我你的名字吗？

So…
You are…
I know you must be someone very important to me
but I surely can’t remember now
Can you tell me your name again?

用户......
我没办法想起来关于这个名字的事情

User…
I can’t seem to recall anything related to this name

但我既然告诉了你这个暗号
你肯定已经知道我作为人偶的身份了吧
我们也一定有一段非常难以忘记的时光
虽然我已经不记得了
但我很想知道曾发生了什么

But since I told you this code
you must know my identity as a Doll
We must’ve had some unforgettable moments together
Though I can’t remember them now
I really want to know what happened

曲率引擎密钥！
你怎么拿到的！

Warp drive key!
How did you get it!?

即便在最后
也在指引着我前进的方向吗...
我知道了
我马上就去
搞定以后我会发消息的

Even at his last moment…
he was guiding me forward...
I understand now
I’ll head over right away
I’ll let you know when it’s done

曲率引擎可以正常使用了
这次没有公司看着
曲率引擎等级可以想用多高用多高了
飞船整体检查目前发现应该是降落姿态控制的问题
泰瑞居然把这个权限也放进密钥里了
目的地已经设定为科朗2-C的轨道了
用上低阶曲率很快就能到了

The warp drive is now usable
With no company oversight this time
we can push the warp drive as high as we want
The current ship check indicates there might be an issue with the landing posture control
Turns out, Tayris even included this permission in the key
The destination is set to Koranth 2-C’s orbit
With low-grade warp, we’ll reach it in a snap

啊！
我刚准备跟你说
我都在找骰子来玩一局TRPG了

Oh!
I was just about to say
I’ve got my dice ready for a TRPG round!

你知道TRPG吗？
！？
你怎么知道的
哦~
之前就跟你玩过吗？还是你们那个时代这个游戏也很火

Wait, you know TRPG?!
!?
How did you know?
Oh~
Did we play it together before? Or is it super popular in your time too?
你知道TRPG吗？
Wait, you know TRPG?!

啊？
哦~
是不是之前我也跟你玩这个？还是你们那个时代这个游戏很风靡
哈哈哈
真是死性不改啊
什么时候都忘不了TRPG

Huh?
Oh, I see
Did I play it with you before? Or is it super popular in your time too?
Haha
Can’t change my ways, huh?
Never forgetting TRPG

啊
已经到了科朗2-C上空了

Ah
we’re already over Koranth 2-C

曲率引擎能多慢呢
红矮星星系轨道半径很小...
这个我上次肯定也说过吧
所以确实就是两句话的功夫

How slow could the warp drive be?
The orbit of the red dwarf system is tiny...
Pretty sure I mentioned this last time too
So yeah, just a couple of words’ worth of time

呃...
本来是打算让海獭号在轨道上漂一会儿的
等玩一会儿我再告诉你到目的地了

Uh...
I was planning to let the Otter drift in orbit a bit
so we could play a round before I said we arrived

嘿嘿嘿嘿
当时我怎么玩的
我还挺好奇的

Hehehe
How did I play it back then?
I’m kinda curious

大成功？
如果是真的我肯定拍照给你了

A crit?
If it were real, I would’ve snapped a pic for you

居然还是001！
我看看现在投骰子的话时间线会变动吗
我先录个像
咳咳
我现在要投骰子了~
这个结果将是001~
走你！

It was a 001!
Let’s see if the timeline changes if I roll again
Recording now
Ahem
I’m rolling the dice now~
And the result will be 001~
Here we go!

平平无奇67
好没特点的一个数字啊
就像一个经典的随机数而已

Plain ol' 67
Such an unremarkable number
It’s just a textbook random number
这也并不特别啊！
It's nothing special!
不过这是否意味着这次命运也发生了改变？
But… does this mean our fate has changed this time?

接下来就是找父亲的飞船位置了
上次也是够巧合的
居然降落的地方刚好在附近
不过也还好吧
本来晨昏线那一圈都不大
适合降落的地方也不多
不过既然命运发生了偏转
这次随便降落的话很大概率会错吧
看看有没有什么办法能确定一下位置

Next up is finding my father’s ship
Last time was pure luck
We just happened to land close by
But that wasn’t so bad, actually
The twilight zone isn’t that wide
Not many suitable landing spots
But now that fate’s been altered
A random landing this time might miss by a mile
Let’s see if there’s a way to lock down the location

这个好！
这个地形很适合用来定位！
飞船应该能很快确定着陆点

This one is good!
The terrain here should be great for pinpointing our location!
The ship should be able to nail down a landing spot

这个天空完全看不出来什么啊
有其他能确定方位的图吗？

Can’t really tell much from that sky shot
Got any other images that might help with positioning?

这个是星球上的生物吗？
好棒！
不过这个也没办法确定位置啦
虽然可以扫描它生长的地方
但还是不能确定更精准的地方

Is this a life form on the planet?
That’s awesome!
But, yeah, this one can’t help with the location
Even though we could scan the area where it grows
it still won’t give us a precise spot

找到了！
马上准备降落

Got it!
Preparing to land now
降落架缓冲启动顺利
Landing gear buffer initialized smoothly
降落角度修正中
Correcting landing angle
核心系统正常运转
Core systems are running normally

顺利降落
就在离他飞船没几步远的地方

Landing successful
Just a few steps away from his ship

飞船停稳了
马上就能找到他了
太激动了

Ship’s stable
I’ll be able to find him soon
So excited!
知道了！
Got it!

找到了
他的手上拿着礼物
我尝试一下能不能打开

Found him
He’s holding a gift in his hand
I’ll try to open it

果然是这个密码
里面是...
一块儿菲涅尔宝石、一封信
还有飞船日志

Yep, that’s the correct password
Inside, there’s…
a Fresnel gem, a letter
and the logs of the ship
原来这一切是这样
So that’s what happened

我会将这些告诉所有人的
没时间在这里感伤了
我们必须立刻动身

I’ll tell everyone about this
No time to be sentimental here
We need to hit the road now

等等，这张信的背后是...
这是密文！
是之前约定好的加密
小时候经常写着玩的
我试着破译看看

Wait, there’s something on the back of this letter…
It’s a cipher!
That encryption method we agreed on before…
The one we used to play with…
I’ll try to decode it

是一个坐标！
连格式都是曲率航行专用的
我现在就返回海獭号试试

It’s coordinates!
And it’s even formatted specifically for warp travel
I’ll head back to the Otter and check it out

难道当时的我没发现吗？
不可能啊...
我当时这个时候是在干吗？

Did I not notice this back then?
No way…
What was I doing at the time?

不会吧
我都说了些啥啊...
我不敢听你讲了
算了
我又有点好奇

No way
What did I even say…
I’m almost afraid to hear it
Forget it
Actually, now I’m kinda curious

我真这么说了？
这些话居然是我能想出来的

Did I really say that?
Can’t believe I came up with those lines

也许我可以尝试去写诗
我似乎是有点天赋在身上的
啊，曲率引擎准备好了
那么一会儿再见了，用户

Maybe I should try writing poetry
Seems like I might have a knack for it
Oh, warp drive’s ready
See you in a bit, User

那没事了
好了
新的目的地已经确定好了
马上进入曲率航行状态
一会儿见了

Alright then
Good
New destination’s locked in
Entering warp mode now
See you in a bit

啊？！！
啊啊啊啊啊？
然后我我我我我我怎么说的

Huh?!!
Whaaat?
And what did I say after that?

我
我
我，咳，怎么说呢
啊，新的目的地已经确认了
海獭号

I…
I…
Well, uh, how should I put this…
Yeah, new destination’s locked in
on the Otter
曲率引擎声音太大了
The warp drive’s too loud

飞船晃太快了
字也看不清了

The ship’s shaking too much
I can’t even read the text

要进入曲率航行了
一会儿见

Entering warp travel now
Catch you in a bit

这样吗？
那可真是遗憾，不过我猜，如果当时开始玩了的话
肯定能够扔出不错的点数
嗯，让我现在也试一试……
啊，一个平平无奇的45呢

Really?
That’s a shame, but I guess if we’d started playing back then
I probably would’ve rolled some decent numbers
Alright, let me try it now...
 Ah, just an unremarkable 45

好吧，那就这样吧
是时候该做正事了

Alright then, let’s leave it at that
It’s time to get down to business

到了
这是一个...
呃...
在拉格朗日点的太空农场？

I’ve got there
This is a…
um…
a space farm at a Lagrange point?

我不知道是不是啊
反正能看到透明的玻璃下种了不少东西

Not pretty sure
but I can see loads of stuff growing under the clear glass

确实
能看到透明的玻璃下种了不少东西

Yeah
I can see plenty of plants growing under that clear glass

外面还有补充阳光用的反射镜
总之先靠过去看看吧

There are also mirrors outside to direct sunlight
Guess I’ll go take a closer look

我进来了
有人在询问我问题

I’m inside
Someone’s questioning me

诶诶诶诶！
怎么还有枪啊！

Whoa, whoa, whoa!
Why do they have guns here?!

说是要接受全面检查
我得先下线一会儿了

They said I have to go through a full inspection
I’ll have to log off for a while

终于搞定了
居然是反抗军营地
难怪在这么隐蔽的地方
我现在在他们安排的宿舍里
他们听说我是从泰瑞公司逃出来的人偶还挺激动的
说是什么什么之类的
总之能帮上不少忙
现在管我的是一个叫Leon的什么队长

Finally done
Turns out, it’s a Resistance base
No wonder it’s so well hidden
They’ve put me up in a dorm here
They got pretty excited when they heard I’m a runaway Doll from Tayris
They’re talking about all kinds of stuff
Anyway, I think I can be of some use here
For now, a guy named Captain Leon is looking after me

但愿吧
也不知道他们具体是一个什么样的组织
不过父亲信任他们的话
应该不差

Hopefully
Not really sure what kind of group they are
But if father trusted them
they should be decent

也许里面的一些成员以前和他共事过吧
应该都不是什么坏人

Maybe some of them used to work with him
I think they’re not bad people

好困，得睡觉了
明天再聊吧
晚安

I’m so tired, need to grab some sleep
Let’s chat more tomorrow
Good night
你绝对想不到我找到什么了！
You’ll never guess what I found!

他们这里还有温室花园！
太棒了
等等
那是风信子吗？

They’ve got a greenhouse garden here!
So cool
Wait…
Is that a hyacinth?
太空里长大的品种要大不少呢
The ones grown in space turn out much bigger
是吧是吧！
Right? Isn’t it amazing!

啊
那边说要集合了
那我先下了

Ah
They’re calling for assembly
I have to go
肯定的！
Absolutely!

用户？
目标要飘走了！
你还在吗？

User?
We’re about to lose the target!
Are you still there?
目标已经丢了...
No… We missed it…
气势很好啊！
That’s the spirit!

好了
现在我们遇到了一点麻烦
是之前跟你说过的那个问题
飞船的主燃料口需要你来控制
我现在已经调整好方向了
到时候我说开始，你打开EH喷射8秒左右后关闭
计时也只能麻烦你自己了
太长或太短都会导致我们丢失目标
最糟糕的情况是喷射时间过长直接撞向前哨站
明白了吗？

Alright
now we’ve got a little problem
Remember that issue I mentioned earlier?
You’ll need to handle the main fuel valve of the ship
I’ve already adjusted our course
